column3: Seems @jgarzik was doing something similar. I've rebased his changes on top of mine now.\n
Tested builds of bitcoind and bitcoin-qt in gitian (linux and windows).\n

I've ran it through the graph-o-matic and it's even readable now! https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/includes_noheaders.svg

This is much better.

It does show there's one circular dependency left:  ui_interface.h <-> util.h
Is this include needed? (it causes a circular dependency, as ui_interface.h also includes util.h)\n
No, I've removed it in #1112. It does require re-adding that include in other files, though.\n
